definition: to wade/to be involved/to concern/to experience/to enter (classical)

sentences.english: In the end, America pulled through nicely.
sentences.chinese: 最終，美國隊令人滿意地涉險過關。

sentences.english: For an adventure in the jungle, consider trekking in northern Thailand. As you trek, you walk in the mountains and pass rivers and waterfalls.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想參與叢林冒險，可以考慮泰北的徒涉險之旅。

sentences.english: She narrowly won the first race.
Getting there would be worth the risks.
sentences.chinese: 而到達這種思想境界，纔是真正值得以身涉險的。
